channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Awesome Weather Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Awesome Weather Widget

item.title: CVE-2021-24474|2024-08-03T19:35:19.667Z -- unknown -- awesome%20weather%20widget
item.description: The Awesome Weather Widget WordPress plugin through 3.0.2 does not sanitize the id parameter of its awesome_weather_refresh AJAX action, leading to an unauthenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability.
